articles.title: U.S. military says it is searching for remnants of Chinese spy balloon - Reuters.com
articles.description: The U.S. military said on Sunday it is searching for remnants of the suspected Chinese surveillance balloon it shot down the previous day, in a dramatic spy saga that has further strained American-Chinese relations.
